2022.title: OpenSearch
2022.description: OpenSearch, launched in January 2021 but gaining major traction in 2022, is a community‑driven fork of Elasticsearch and Kibana for search, analytics, and foundational SIEM capabilities.

2022.title: OWASP ZAP by Checkmarx
2022.description: OWASP ZAP (Zed Attack Proxy), moved to the Linux Foundation and rebranded in late 2022, is an advanced open‑source DAST scanner for web apps with enhanced plugin and API support.

2022.title: ClamAV
2022.description: ClamAV, a cross‑platform open‑source antivirus engine widely used on mail servers and endpoints, continued active maintenance and signature updates through 2022.

2022.title: Vet
2022.description: Vet is an open‑source software supply‑chain security tool that analyzes dependencies to detect known vulnerabilities and potentially malicious packages, highlighted in 2022.

2022.title: Misconfig Mapper
2022.description: Misconfig Mapper, a Golang CLI introduced around 2022, detects cloud configuration issues and service misconfigurations using fingerprint templates.

2022.title: BadDNS
2022.description: BadDNS, a Python‑based open‑source tool to scan for domain/subdomain takeover risks, saw updates and increased adoption in 2022.
